title: Upbeat Lively Modern Indie Pop
description: High-Quality Original Music from Professional Composers, designed for use in Video Games. Features 12 Original tracks, converted into 157 sound files, tailor-made for Royalty-Free use in Video Games.
longDescription:
Soundcloud Preview Link


Indie Pop Pack is a High-Quality Music pack made by Pro Composers, Instrumentalists, and Producers, specially edited and curated for Video Games. The HUGE collection of 157 wav files and loops gives you full creative control over the music in your gaming product, like having the music producer in your back pocket, the same way as TV/Film producers and directors do.


========================

MASSIVE CONTENT

========================


From 12 original genuine artistic tracks, written by Pro Composers and all featuring Live Instruments, there are 157 Musical Elements for your project, including 91 seamless loops, with a Massive 2 hours and 31 minutes of play time! These can be used for different levels, menu screens, cutaways, and expansion content. 


========================

ADAPTABLE AND VERSATILE

========================


If you’re planning multi-level platformers, you can change up the music throughout using one of 91 different loops. Puzzle games can ramp up the urgency in timed levels by using more intense track versions, and RPG scenes that need more space for voiceovers, or need to mark the end of a chapter can cut straight to a different edit, so the change is marked musically.


========================

PRO LEVEL MUSIC, INDIE BUDGET

========================


The Music in this Pack has been made by Creators with masses of experience writing Music for High End Media, and has already clocked up thousands of hours on television broadcasts all over the world. The Quality of this Music product, greatly increases the Quality of your Games.


========================

STYLE AND FEEL 

========================


The music is in this pack is firmly in the Indie Pop/Rock genre, with quirky synths, energetic guitars, punchy drums, and modern swirling synths and FX. Suitable for a range of genres gaming genres, such as platformers, sports, puzzles, quirky casual games, and anything looking for an injection of modern day vibes. Check the full tracks on Soundcloud : https://soundcloud.com/matt-harvey-vgm/sets/upbeat-lively-modern-indie-pop


========================

FULL COLLECTION DETAILS

========================


• 157 original high-quality WAV tracks (16-bit / 44.1 kHz)

• 91 seamless loops

• 2 hrs & 31 min. of music

• 1.6 GB of music

• Unlimited Royalty-Free license


========================

ABOUT THE COMPOSER :

========================


Matt Harvey has created production music for High End Media Productions for over a decade. He has written for 1000’s of television shows, movies, online streamers, and adverts. His music is heard all over the world by millions. He has a dedicated studio using £1000’s worth of equipment, guitars, hardware, and software. These music products are crafted by a dedicated professional with years of experience.


This collection is a great way to get Top Level Music into your project on an Indie Budget.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 157

Number of Audio Cues: 157

Sample rate / bit rate: 48 Khz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 151

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Important/Additional Notes: All artwork created under license with MidJourney AI. Contains sound samples, used under license.
